3003086.Condition: As the 2nd attacker in the turn or As the 3rd attacker in the turn

4003086.Condition: When there are 1 or more Vegeta's Family category allies on the team

5003086.Condition: When there is an ally attacking on the same turn whose name includes Trunks (Kid)

6003086.Condition: When there is an ally attacking on the same turn whose name includes Trunks (Kid) and With 1 or more Rainbow or PHY or STR or INT or TEQ or AGL Ki Spheres obtained

7003086.Condition: When there is an ally attacking on the same turn whose name includes Trunks (Kid) and With 2 or more Rainbow or PHY or STR or INT or TEQ or AGL Ki Spheres obtained

8003086.Condition: When there is an ally attacking on the same turn whose name includes Trunks (Kid) and With 3 or more Rainbow or PHY or STR or INT or TEQ or AGL Ki Spheres obtained

9003086.Condition: When there is an ally attacking on the same turn whose name includes Trunks (Kid) and With 4 or more Rainbow or PHY or STR or INT or TEQ or AGL Ki Spheres obtained

10003086.Condition: When there is an ally attacking on the same turn whose name includes Trunks (Kid) and With 5 or more Rainbow or PHY or STR or INT or TEQ or AGL Ki Spheres obtained

11003086.Condition: When there is an ally attacking on the same turn whose name includes Trunks (Kid) and With 6 or more Rainbow or PHY or STR or INT or TEQ or AGL Ki Spheres obtained

12003086.Condition: When there is an ally attacking on the same turn whose name includes Trunks (Kid) and With 7 or more Rainbow or PHY or STR or INT or TEQ or AGL Ki Spheres obtained
